paper_keywords: the continuation theorem of coincidence degree theory
paper_abstract: By using the continuation theorem of coincidence degree theory, the existence of a positive periodic solution for the generalized two-predator and one-prey system with time delay is established. Further, by constructing a Lyapunov functional and using the result in the existence part of positive periodic solutions, the attractivity of positive periodic solutions for the above system is obtained. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence and global attractivity of positive periodic solutions for a generalized predator-prey system with time delay
